HttpRouteResource.description: Resource that specifies an HTTP Route. An HTTP Route resource provides a stable URL that can be used to route internal or extrnal traffic to a resource.

hostname.description: The internal hostname accepting traffic for the route. Readonly.

port.description: The port number for the route. Defaults to 80. Readonly.

scheme.description: The scheme used for traffic. Readonly.

url.description: A stable URL that that can be used to route traffic to a resource. Readonly.
